name: AFTERLIFE (itch) (Tuning Mania)
description:
Steam page link: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1619590/AFTERLIFE/

AFTERLIFE it's a completely brand new Cyberpunk Horror Shooter Game! when you have to fight for your survival you become a hero. From street gangs to corporations that control the world, you have to fight for yourself and your heart. - Steam classified AFTERLIFE as adult game so you need to be logged to visit the store page. Make sure to have enabled adult contend games on your steam preferences. - AFTERLIFE HAS NOT EXPLICIT SEXUAL CONTENT! It contains blood, gore and soft nudity.
